page.title: 04A REPORT ON SCHOOLS,SLOUGH
page.content: In part of our area we found three types of junior schools. There are the Church of England Schools, the Roman Catholic Schools and schools which are not connected to any church at all. The Church of England School is called{Farnham Royal.} Then came the Roman Catholic Schools which are called{St. Anthony's First and Middle Schools. Lastly came the schools which are not connected to any type of church at all. They are called {William Penn Nursery, First and Middle Schools. Farnham Royal is a school with classes with mixed ages in them up to twelve years. It has beautiful open fields and a charming church called St. Mary's. The children go there for services and special occasions. St. Anthony's First School has children aged from five to eight.
